text:
One thing that would make me inclined to take some of our internal HubSpot “extensions” that we’ve built and publish to the marketplace, would be if there was billing embedded in the platform. 
Ie our app usage gets invoiced on the customer’s monthly HubSpot invoice, and HubSpot can take a cut for providing this. 

With the settings page for apps, this would allow us to never having the user in our interface, and it would be a much smoother experience.
